title: need help!
body:
Well.... I just have started the game this week, I honestly loved the game but there were so much struggles that forcing me to delete it -.- , Anyways here is what happens always.. when it's loading the game before the match it takes too long and sometimes i get crashed then i get a penalty for no reason !!! i wasn't afk ! the game got bugged and then it took me out of the game and when i came back to reconnect i've got a penalty for 20 mins for something that i had nothing to do with it ,And also it says reconnect at the game even the connection is good ,One more last thing that when i enters the store it says that my ip got banned and when i try to login with the same ip it says login error  .. i hate it while playing my screen freezes it's really sucks to play with an issue like this and the penalties too -.-!!!! 
SO PLEASE GIVE ME A SOLUTION ASAP !

replies.body: I  had a problem like this , in loading screen the game crash and let me tell that i was in promo for diamond with 2 W and 2 L and when i try to reconnect , i just simply can't . I posted something to ask riot to give me some information , maybe give the promo back , but they don't really care tbh ..
I've Submitted a request in support ticket and waiting for a respond.... :|

When you say crash, what do you mean exactly?  For example, are you receiving any errors and what do they say?  Otherwise, is it just a black screen?  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and let our tech team know.  Make sure to include details on the questions asked here as well as the context provided in this post, such as the store issue.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain a set of logs for context, and attach them to your ticket.  We'll respond asap!

Crash is that it takes me out of the game it doesn't appear as a black screen it just freezes the game till it gets me out of it the same thing while loading the game .. I've submitted it there, appreciated your help :)
